oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Heritage plants in museum environment - three museum gardens in south western Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heinonen, Maarit
Hartikainen, Merja
Antonius, Kristiina
Kinnanen, Hilma
Pihlman, Sirkku
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Task: to gather diverse - biological and cultural and local - knowledge related to plant genetic resources, especially horticultural old historic varieties and landraces.
Challenge: to combine this knowledge and utilize it for promoting the public awareness and enhancing on-garden management in museums.
Cases of three museum gardens and teir vegetation in south western Finland.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Heinonen, Maarit; Hartikainen, Merja; Antonius, Kristiina; Kinnanen, Hilma and Pihlman, Sirkku (2011) Heritage plants in museum environment - three museum gardens in south western Finland. Paper at: Biodiversity in agriculture - lessons learned and future directions, NJF seminar 436, Ulvik in Hardanger, Norway, 24-26 May 2011.
